src:
Kencan di Harmoni, Single Terbaru Wahyu Selow
04 Nov 2019, 06:14 by Windy Eka Pramudya
MULAI dikenal sebagai solois pada 2017, Wahyu Ramdani atau Wahyu Selow terus melaju. Single Selow yang melambungkan namanya membuat Wahyu tak ingin terjebak sebagai one hit wonder. Setelah melepas Selow dan Kamu Gila pada Maret 2019, kini Wahyu kembali lewat single bertajuk Kencan Di Harmoni.
Tak banyak yang tahu kalau Wahyu sudah mencintai musik sejak kecil. Pada 2004, Wahyu mulai menyanyi di sejumlah kafe di Jakarta dan bertemu dengan Nyonk Kunci, penggubah lagu Selow. Nyonk lah yang mengajak Wahyu masuk ke dunia rekaman.
Kerja sama Wahyu dan Kunci terus berlanjut. Setelah Selow, single Kamu Gila juga merupakan buah karya Nyonk. Sekarang, nomor Kencan Di Harmoni juga menjadi kolaborasi Wahyu dengan Nyonk. Di lagu ini, Wahyu hadir dengan lagu bertema cinta yang fun.
"Lagu ini ceritanya tentang pasangan yang janjian mau kencan di Harmoni, tapi terjebak kemacetan lalu lintas. Si cowoknya takut kalau ceweknya bakal marah dan memutuskan hubungan. Akan tetapi, ternyata ceweknya tetep sabar menunggu dan si cowok sampai lokasi janjian dengan aman. Alhasil mereka bisa kencan deh," tutur Wahyu via pos-el, Minggu, 3 November 2019.
Lagu Kencan Di Harmoni disajikan berbeda dari lagu Selow dan Kamu Gila. Aransemen musik Kencan Di Harmoni dikemas dengan musik pop, RnB, dan funk. Penggarapan lagu ini pun terbilang cepat, hanya sekitar empat jam studio rekaman. 
"Yang istimewa dari lagu ini, musiknya dibuat upbeat, dan ada funk-nya. Pokoknya enak lah bisa bikin kita bergoyang," kata Wahyu.
Video klip Kencan Di Harmoni pun sudah rampung dibuat. Dengan mengambil lokasi syuting di Bandung dan beberapa lokasi kemacetan di Jalan Harmoni, Jakarta, Wahyu tampil berbeda dengan pakaian warna-warni. 
"Harapan saya, semoga lagu ini bisa diterima masyarakat luas seperti lagu-lagu saya sebelumnya. Selain itu, bisa dinikmati banyak kalangan, dan bisa bikin happy banyak orang," ujar Wahyu.***

Baca Juga
text:
Dating in Harmony, Wahyu Selow's Latest Single
Nov 04 2019, 06:14 by Windy Eka Pramudya
STARTED known as soloist in 2017, Wahyu Ramdani or Wahyu Selow kept going. Single Selow which catapulted his name made Wahyu not want to be trapped as one hit wonder. After releasing Selow and You Crazy in March 2019, Wahyu is now returning through a single titled Dating in Harmony.
Not many people know that Wahyu has loved music since childhood. In 2004, Wahyu began singing in a number of cafes in Jakarta and met with Nyonk Kunci, composer of the Selow song. Nyonk was the one who invited Wahyu to enter the recording world.
Revelation and Key cooperation continues. After Selow, the single Kamu Gila is also the work of Nyonk. Now, the Dating number in Harmoni is also a collaboration of Wahyu with Nyonk. In this song, Wahyu comes with a fun-themed love song.
"This song tells the story of a couple who promised to date in Harmony, but was stuck in a traffic jam. The boy was afraid that his girlfriend would get angry and break up. However, it turns out that his girl was patiently waiting and the boy arrived at the appointment location safely. As a result they could safely. a date, "Wahyu said via e-mail, Sunday, November 3, 2019.
The song Dating in Harmony is presented differently from the Selow and Kamu Gila songs. The music arrangement for Dating in Harmony is packed with pop music, RnB, and funk. The cultivation of this song was fairly fast, only about four hours of recording studios.
"The special thing about this song is that the music is made upbeat, and there is funk. The good thing is that it can make us shake," Wahyu said.
The video clip for Dating in Harmony has also been completed. By taking a shooting location in Bandung and several traffic jam locations on Jalan Harmoni, Jakarta, Wahyu appeared different with colorful clothes.
"My hope is that this song can be accepted by the wider community like my previous songs. Besides, it can be enjoyed by many people, and can make many people happy," Wahyu said. ***
